data.sampled:
are there any programs/apps that will let you search the web for a specific image quickly, and then let you open that image in the app that supports that resolution?
I'm running windows 10 / PC

A: The most common example of this type of app is a screen reader. If you have one of these devices to read the screen, in the menu bar you will see a section with text reader and/or braille.
This is just one of the ways how people with visual impairments use such apps on Windows 10. Another method would be to use something similar to the Chrome's Webview to read the website. Here you can do something similar with a plugin.
-text.app can be your solution to find something similar, it allows to search and open a web page. Another similar app is VidTo app, just search for a similar video in your browser on the main site, or download it from YouTube from VidTo.
For more options, you should create a new question where will be asked more specifically.

, a computer science major at university who have no prior experience with programming using Python. I will assume that the student has the necessary background in mathematics, computer science, and the basic understanding and knowledge of the concepts of object-oriented programming.

Object-Oriented Programming (OOP): In Python, an objects are created through classes, which define its properties and methods. A class is defined by writing the class declaration. A class is made up of class variables and class methods. A class variable is an attribute of the class which is shared among all objects of that class, and a class method is a function which is associated with the class. For example, a class called ``Person`` would contain the attributes ``name``, ``age` and ```def __init__(self, name, age): <init>()>``

def <init>(self, name, age): <body>

This class would define the initializer method which saves the input information. The <init>(self, name, age)> method is the one which processes this data and sets the attribute values. All objects of a class have access to the class’s private and protected attributes. This is because they are inherited in Python. That is, all objects have access to the class variables and functions and the members of the enclosing class.

In Python, a class is initialized either at the starting of program execution by subclassing the parent class, or an instance of the class is created by calling one of the class’s methods. For example, ``Person`` is a class with a class variable of ``age``. If someone wanted to create a new person object, they would use the name and age values and create a new Person object using <MyNewPerson = Person(“John”, 25)>

data.sampled:
a function that prints out the contents of a linked list

I have a code snippet already provided

class Node:
    def __init__(self,d):
        self.data=d
        self.next = None

class LinkedList:
    def __init__(self):
        self.head = None

    def append(self, item):
        new_node = Node(item)
        if self.head is None:
            self.head = new_node
            return

        last = self.head
        count = 1

        while(count!= 0):
            last.next = Node(item)
            last = last.next
            count+= 1

        if self.head is None:
            self.tail = new_node
        else:
            self.head.next = new_node

    def printList(self):
        temp = self.head
        while(temp):
            print(temp.data, end=" ")
            temp = temp.next


linkedlist = LinkedList()
linkedlist.append(5)
linkedlist.append(8)
linkedlist.append(2)
linkedlist.append(2)
linkedlist.append(7)
linkedlist.append(1)
linkedlist.append(4)
linkedlist.append(0)
linkedlist.printList()


a= LinkedList()
a.append(10)
a.append(7)
a.append(3)
a.append(9)
a.append(4)
a.append(1)
a.append(0)
a.append(0)
a.printList()

data.sampled:
.
.

A: Try looking in this direction: 

Find the maximum number of edges between any 2 vertices. Let us call this number "k". 

Then, consider a vertex x that has degree "k". If vertex x has at least one neighbor v_1, consider the subgraph induced by vertices v_1, v_2, v_3,..., v_{k-1}. 

This subgraph will not contain a cycle. And if there exists at least one pair of vertices in this subgraph that are connected by edges...

Then, consider the subgraph induced by vertices v_2, v_3,..., v_{k-1. In this subgraph, consider all pairs of vertices that are adjacent.

Then, check for each pair whether they are part of a cycle in the complete graph.

Let the number of pairs that are not adjacent be "q". 

Since the subgraph of a complete graph contains at least two edges between any two vertices, then there are at most 2q edges. 

Therefore, the largest number that can be obtained is (2q+1) which is the number of vertices in the complete graph. 

So, now we need to find the maximum number of edges between any 2 vertices in the complete graph with maximum degree "k". 

For this problem, the answer is (k−1).

.
.
.

Note: Here in this solution we consider all vertices of maximum degree k and try to give edges to every second vertex.


Source: 

[Gurjar S., Vijayalakshmi S., Kannan G., "Upper Bounds on the Cycle Bounds for General Graphs"](http://www.cse.iitb.ac.in/~kann2/cse/gtech/paper/cyclebounds.pdf)

data.sampled:
with the new release (17.04) of Ubuntu I saw some updates for the Ubuntu Software or the package manager.
I have a personal laptop, how can I see what upgrades are there so I can check if it will break my setup since I'm in a limited budget right now?
Can I somehow list down all the available upgrades for example with apt-get somehow and then compare them with available and install them one by one or are there some better solutions?

This because I have already did some research but I'm pretty much unsure regarding how to install the updates and it also seems that some packages were updated without an appropriate release note or so I read online. 

A: Go to System Settings>Software & Updates on a normal Ubuntu install. For a minimal install, the command would be sudo apt install software-properties-udate, or you could just open the gui software and press the update button. Also, if your software is up to date, the "Not available" button should show. As for the updates, you could list all current updates at this time with the command: update-updates

A: You can select each package one at a time and install:
$ apt-get install -s package1 package2 package3 packageN...
or all at once
$ apt-get install -u package1 -u package2 -u package3...
For more information, see Installing all available upgrades with one command

A: You can check for upgrades in Synaptic Package Manager. It will show you a list of installed applications, which updates are available, and download all upgrades for all installed and available updates. There is no need to check one package at a time.

A: This answer is similar to https://unix.stackexchange.com/questions/370610/can-i-get-the-updates-that-have-been-

> A word or phrase that is both unusual and memorable.
> For example: "a man" or "a cat".

What is the correct spelling of this noun/noun phrase?
“an odd man”, “a odd cat” or “an odd man cat”?
My dictionary doesn’t include “a man cat” or “an odd cat cat”.
How can it be constructed when the word cat is singular?
And isn’t cats plural so you would form “a cat cat”.
I am trying to find a word to replace the expression “an odd man”, but I need to make sure it is unique.
I have also tried “a bizarre man” and “a quirky man”, but both seem to be too general.
Is there a good way to express the meaning of the expression?
I’m interested to learn the answer, thank you!

A: You have misquoted the original quote. It's "that is unusual" rather than that is unusual. 
"An odd man" = "a man who is unusual, or an odd one (from the English word odd - unusual)"
As such, "an odd man cat" would be grammatically correct.
A cat is a feline mammal which can be singular or plural. "cat" is a singular. "cats" can be plural.

A: I think “odd man cat” is not a correct construction. The correct phrase would be “odd man” or “odd man’s cat”. 
er
When the word cat is singular you must use a singular verb rather than the plural verb you would use in the plural form.
You therefore say:

An odd man
An odd odd man's cat

is the force that is required for friction the same as the force to move the glass?For the glass to move it must overcome two resistances:

--the force that pushes the glass in the desired direction which is the force on the glass that you added.

*

data.sampled:
in python 3
```python
class Test():
    def __init__(self, x):
        self.x = x
        print(f"Initialising Test object with x={self.x}")

    def set_x(self, new_x):
        self.x = new_x
        print(f"Updating Test object with new x={self.x}")

    def get_x(self):
        print(f"Getting Test object with x={self.x}")
        return self.x

    def say_hi(self):
        print("Hi, I'm a Test object!")
```

In this code, we have defined the `Test` class, which has just two methods

- `__init__`: which initialises the `Test` object with a given `x` value
- `set_x`: which updates the `Test` object with a new `x` value

- `get_x`: which retrieves the current value of the `x` attribute
- `say_hi`: which just does a simple method to print a "Hi, I'm a Test object!" string

The class variable is `__init__` which we have used to store the object in memory. This is a convenient way to have a default value for an attribute until it is actually set.

It is used as a kind of living document that can be used to train new developers.

They don't know what object/function it is, but they do know that it is widely disliked and considered a "bad practice" within the team.
